conteudo: .auth-wrapper{width:100%;max-width:420px}.auth-card{background:rgba(255,255,255,.88);border-radius:20px;padding:24px 22px 20px;border:1px solid rgba(148,163,184,.4);box-shadow:var(--shadow-soft);backdrop-filter:blur(14px)}.auth-header{margin-bottom:18px}.auth-title{font-size:1.7rem}.auth-subtitle{margin-top:4px;font-size:.9rem;color:var(--text-muted)}.auth-form{display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:12px}.form-group{display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:4px}.form-group label{font-size:.85rem;color:var(--text-muted)}.form-group input{border-radius:999px;border:1px solid var(--border-soft);padding:9px 13px;font-size:.9rem;outline:none;transition:border-color var(--transition-fast),box-shadow var(--transition-fast),background var(--transition-fast),transform var(--transition-fast);background:rgba(255,255,255,.9)}.form-group input:focus{border-color:var(--accent);box-shadow:0 0 0 1px rgba(249,115,22,.35);background:#fff;transform:translateY(-.5px)}.auth-message{min-height:22px;margin-top:10px;font-size:.85rem;color:var(--text-muted)}.auth-message.is-error{color:var(--danger)}.auth-message.is-success{color:var(--success)}.auth-message.is-warn{color:var(--warn)}
